com.st.olm.cq.api.views

Interface STViewManager


  • public interface STViewManager
    STViewManager is used to get, create, update and deleted views
    Author:
    mck

        STView create(TransitorySTView view)
       throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • getView

        STView getView(String type,
               String id)
        Parameters:
        type - The unique type for the view you wish to retrieve
        id - The unique id for the view you wish to retrieve
        Returns:
        The view as an STView

      • hasChanges

        boolean hasChanges()
        Checks to see if the view has pending changes
        Returns:
        True if the view has pending changes and false otherwise

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Updates the view to the current state

      • resolveView

        STView resolveView(String pathSegment)
        Parameters:
        pathSegment - The path segment for the STView to resolve. This should follow the root path and only show the parts of the path defined in the view tree.
        Returns:
        The STView resolved for the path

      • revert

        void revert()
        Reverts all changes to the view
